name: Collector's Dream and his deal with Chaos
name_original: Collector's Dream and his deal with Chaos
description:
Intro

In this game, you will take role of the grocery store employee called Collector. You were assigned to sort fruit and vegetables - concretely squashes, apples, lemons and grapes. Pretty normal, right? Well, it is. Atleast at the first glance. But there is a twist with capital T.   
You can enter into an agreement with Chaos. This will increase your score and give you some further bonuses, but it will also make a glitch in our reality, so the Cursed Arrows will be able to fly thru and hurt you. Do you agree?

Controls

 Left and Right Arrow: Movement

Mouse: Open and Buy from Shop
